definition: rice noodle roll, a roll made from sheets of rice flour dough, steamed and stuffed with meat, vegetables etc
powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: Because of its long rectangular shape, with pig intestines similar, so called rice rolls.
sentences.chinese: 因其形状为长条形，与猪肠相似，故取名肠粉。

sentences.english: In fact, authentic Guangzhou Chang Fen is very complex.
sentences.chinese: 其实，正宗的广州肠粉做法是很复杂的。

definition: fried radish cake (a type of dim sum, commonly called "turnip cake")
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒麥|烧麦[shao1 mai4]
Cantonese sponge cake also known as mara cake
siu mei/spit-roasted meat dish in Cantonese cuisine
shumai (shao mai) steamed dumpling/also written 燒賣|烧卖[shao1 mai4]
